title: Disney+ and Netflix not working anymore on my Google Pixel c tablet
content:
As the title says, Disney+ and Netflix not working anymore on my Google Pixel c tablet since 2 months.
I do not understand why as it always worked fine and and i am running on Android 8.1.

Maybe this will help, but with Disney+ i get error code 39 when trying to start a movie
With Netflix, it doesn't even allows me to enter the home screen and just gets stuck and shuts down.

Hope someone can help.
